name: Boomerang Boy (The Hooded Olive)
description:
Your stuck in the Australian Outback on Boxing Day! OH NO! Now all of the Kangaroos want to box you! Chuck your boomerang at them to erase them and keep you safe!

CONTROLS

WASD to move

Left Click to throw boomerang

Right Click to Dash

This game was made in three hours for the Trijam 201 with the theme of Only One Shot. As such you only have one boomerang to throw and that's it.
